Text: Chizer:  Chizers are a mix of the Chihuahua and the miniature schnauzer.

Text: Chizer:  The chizer is a small breed dog, and works great in smaller areas, such as apartments, condos, and townhomes.

Text: Chizer:  They are usually low to average shedding dogs, and typically most groomers leave their facial hair to mimic a schnauzer beard.

Text: Chizer:  The chizer can have either an apple shaped head, or round head, with either a long or short snout, giving it either the appearance of a Chihuahua or Miniature Schnauzer.
